title: Windows XP SP3 5508 RED Edition
description:
WINDOWS XP SP3 5508 RED Edition
   
                             
   One DVD ISO "RedXPSP3" x86 
   2.32 GB (2,495,938,560 bytes) 
   Windows XP Professional SP3 - 5.1.2600.5508 Build 2600xpsp080320-1628 

    Improved over older version WINDOWS XP SP3 5508 Reloaded Glass. Now it is more compact, only 2.32GB!
	Cleaned unnecessary programs on advices of users. Some programs and Customization Packs can still be found in (C:/)Supporting Programs.
	Now the Setup is faster. The Engines are the same, with latest SP3 and newest Runtimes!
	Added Vista Sidebar that can be configured with RED Pack and gadgets from Desktop Folder &#039;RED&#039; 
	Upgraded with Driver Hotfix for (UAA) HD Audio for SP3!
	Newest Programs integrated! 
	Many Tweaks implemented like before now even with more colors and look!
	
    Release Date .....: 3 April 2008            
    Serial ..........: Not Needed
    Tested in VMware and on real Hardware
    Fully automated install! 
    Latest WGA integrated! Ready for MS updates
    Uxtheme Patched System
    IE7 & WMP 11 plus hotfixes integrated
    No viruses or Troyans
     
     Tweaked with RED Pack, RED Wallpapers, Vista SideBar, Glass Vista effect, custom sounds, cursors, Vista RTM fonts, Vista 
  Bootscreen, RED Logon, Vista Drive Indicators, colours, possibilities to choose
  different Icon Packs...   

  Extended Control Panel and Right-Click MEnu.
  Default Vishal-Gupta VistaVG VisualStyle with Glass effect integrated and RED Wallpaper!!
  Many HQ Walls integrated , and skins and suites on your hard disk in C:/Supporting Programs!
  
   
[Drivers]
Latest DriverPacks (March 2008) &#039;www.driverpacks.net&#039;
all for the wnt5_x86-32 OS
DriverPack Chipset 7.10.1 
DriverPack CPU 7.04.1

DriverPack Graphics C 7.12

DriverPack MassStorage 8.02.1 
DriverPack Sound A 8.02.1 
DriverPack Sound B 7.12 
DriverPack WLAN 8.02 
SATA Support
Plus integrated Driver Support for (UAA)HD Audio

-----------------------
Two Launchbars installed by default:
    RocketDock (Integrated, starting with boot)
    Latest Vista Sidebar
	You can choose your favorite! (Don&#039;t use both at the same time)

============================================================

There are still optional additional Programs and Skins that Windows Setup put them in (C:/)Supporting Programs
    Ashampoo Burning studio 
    JetAudio 7.0.5 Plus VX
    SUPER Audio and video Converter
    Your Uninstaller 2008 Pro
    UltraIso Premium 9.0
    Internet Explorer 8 Pre-release (very stable, better then IE7)
    Stardock IconPackager, ObjectDock Plus,Windows Media Player Alienware, 
    Old Skins from XP SP3 Reloaded Glass;
	Unique (Bio)WindowBlinds 5.5 - Optimus with easy to implement patch, just run the install and restart! It is in Spanish language but very easy to install and use! Highly recommended! 
	Before applying WindowBlinds skin unload VisualStyle through Display Properties.
	etc.



Three Icon Packs,very easy to change-just double-click on any pack. It automatically changes all system icons by using TuneUp 2008 that is allready installed:
Now You change them easily by opening the shortcut Folder "Change Icons" on Desktop 
    Vista Icons
    Longhorn Icons
    Leopard Icons

=============================================================
Only two times the Setup is slowing down - during the install of .Net Runtimes. It is OK! Don&#039;t Worry!

Now with new RED Macromedia Flash Screen with music. Just close the Flash whenever you like and you are in Windows! 
Tune the startups whatever you like! And clean icons that you don&#039;t need from Desktop.
When everything is installed go on visit MS Update. It will offer 2-3 things and update for NVidia drivers if you have NVidia Card (Version 169.21 Drivers is already integrated into the System) If you want to upgrade, I strongly recommend not to do it from Microsoft but to download drivers from www.Nvidia.com, followed by regular procedure for installation video drivers. 
     
Enjoy!! and Thank you for using Win XP SP3 RED Edition! :)
